name: A Tale of Three Cities: Introduction to Contemporary Art in China
description: An introduction to Chinese contemporary art focusing on three cities: Beijing, Shanghai, and Guangzhou. Increasing globalization and China's persistent self-renovation has brought radical changes to cities, a subject of fascination for contemporary artists. The art works will be analyzed in relation to critical issues such as globalization and urban change. Same as VPHC74H3
prerequisites: 2 full credits at the B-level in Art History, Asian History, and/or Global Asia Studies, including at least one of VPHB39H3, VPHB73H3, GASB58H3/HISB58H3, GASB33H3, or (GASB35H3)
